input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product title.

Product title:
Photo Background Paper Graduated, Black to Neutral Gray, 31 Inches Wide x 43 Inches Long, Ultra Smooth Non-Reflective Plastic Film for Product Photography - This Product is NOT Returnable

Product keywords:
Ideal for product presentation
Non-glare, matte finish, cleanable
For cleaning, use mild detergent only
Printed on white plastic film for ultra smooth, crease-resistant sweep
All photography backgrounds (with the exception of the lighter fabric chroma key Muslin backgrounds) shipped to Canada are subject to a brokerage and customs fee determined at the Canadian customs, which can be substantial
All photo background paper is not returnable

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Our Photo Background Paper Graduated from Black to Neutral Gray is the perfect backdrop for showcasing your products in the best light possible. Measuring 31 inches wide and 43 inches long, this non-reflective plastic film has a non-glare, matte finish. This background paper can be cleaned with mild detergent, ensuring a crisp and polished look every time. Printed on white plastic film for an ultra-smooth, crease-resistant sweep, this background paper is ideal for product presentations and photoshoots. 

Please note that all photography backgrounds (with the exception of the lighter fabric chroma key Muslin backgrounds) shipped to Canada are subject to a brokerage and customs fee determined at the Canadian customs, which can be substantial. Unfortunately, all photo background paper is not returnable. Add this professional touch to your product photography today!
input_text.Response B: This graduated, black to neutral gray, background paper is the perfect choice for product photography. The non-reflective matte finish on this backdrop allows for the photographer to achieve a professional look without the worry of unwanted reflections. It is also cleanable, making it a great choice for long-term use. This product is not returnable.
